mapper.select: select a.emp_id, a.emp_company_id, a.classes_id, to_char(a.on_duty_scheduling_date::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') on_duty_scheduling_date, to_char(a.off_duty_scheduling_date::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') off_duty_scheduling_date, to_char(a.rest_start_time::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') rest_start_time, to_char(a.rest_end_time::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') rest_end_time, a.week, a.sign_in_rule, a.sign_out_rule, a.on_punch_card_rule, a.off_punch_card_rule FROM classes_employee_ AS a WHERE a.emp_company_id=#{companyId} AND a.emp_id=#{employeeId} AND a.on_duty_scheduling_date IS NOT NULL AND a.on_duty_scheduling_date!='' AND a.the_date::DATE=#{countDate}::DATE

SELECT min(record_date) FROM( SELECT a.record_date FROM device.door_record AS a LEFT JOIN device.door_ AS b ON a.door_id=b.door_id WHERE a.employee_id=#{employeeId} AND b.company_id=#{companyId} AND (a.record_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime}) AND (a.record_type='2' OR a.record_type='3' OR a.record_type='6' OR a.record_type='7' OR a.record_type='8') UNION SELECT to_char(b.fill_card_time::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS record_date FROM application_fill_card_ b LEFT JOIN application_total_record_ AS c ON b.application_no=c.application_no WHERE b.employee_id=#{employeeId} AND b.company_id=#{companyId} AND ((c.application_no IS NOT NULL AND c.is_complete='1' AND c.is_reject='0' ) OR c.application_no IS NULL) AND (b.fill_card_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime}) ) AS c

SELECT max(record_date) FROM( SELECT a.record_date FROM device.door_record AS a LEFT JOIN device.door_ AS b ON a.door_id=b.door_id WHERE a.employee_id=#{employeeId} AND b.company_id=#{companyId} AND (a.record_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime}) AND (a.record_type='2' OR a.record_type='3' OR a.record_type='6' OR a.record_type='7' OR a.record_type='8') UNION SELECT to_char(b.fill_card_time::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS record_date FROM application_fill_card_ b LEFT JOIN application_total_record_ AS c ON b.application_no=c.application_no WHERE b.employee_id=#{employeeId} AND b.company_id=#{companyId} AND ((c.application_no IS NOT NULL AND c.is_complete='1' AND c.is_reject='0' ) OR c.application_no IS NULL) AND (b.fill_card_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime}) ) AS c

SELECT DISTINCT to_char(a.start_time::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') start_time, to_char(a.end_time::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') end_time,a.employee_id, a.department_id,a.company_id, '1' AS application_type, leave_type AS application_children_type FROM application_leave_ a LEFT JOIN application_total_record_ AS b ON a.application_no=b.application_no WHERE a.employee_id=#{employeeId} AND a.company_id=#{companyId} AND b.is_complete='1' AND b.is_reject='0' AND ((#{endTime} BETWEEN a.start_time AND a.end_time) OR (a.end_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime})) ORDER BY start_time

SELECT DISTINCT to_char(a.start_time::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') start_time, to_char(a.end_time::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') end_time,a.employee_id, a.department_id,a.company_id, b.is_skip_rest_day, '4' AS application_type FROM application_outgoing_ a LEFT JOIN application_total_record_ AS b ON a.application_no=b.application_no WHERE a.employee_id=#{employeeId} AND a.company_id=#{companyId} AND b.is_complete='1' AND b.is_reject='0' AND ((#{endTime} BETWEEN a.start_time AND a.end_time) OR (a.end_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime})) ORDER BY start_time

SELECT DISTINCT to_char(a.start_time::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') start_time, to_char(a.end_time::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') end_time,a.employee_id, a.department_id,a.company_id, b.is_skip_rest_day, '3' AS application_type FROM application_business_travel_ a LEFT JOIN application_total_record_ AS b ON a.application_no=b.application_no WHERE a.employee_id=#{employeeId} AND a.company_id=#{companyId} AND b.is_complete='1' AND b.is_reject='0' AND ((#{endTime} BETWEEN a.start_time AND a.end_time) OR (a.end_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime})) ORDER BY start_time

SELECT DISTINCT to_char(a.start_time::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') start_time, to_char(a.end_time::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') end_time,a.employee_id, a.department_id,a.company_id, '2' AS application_type FROM application_overtime_ a LEFT JOIN application_total_record_ AS b ON a.application_no=b.application_no WHERE a.employee_id=#{employeeId} AND a.company_id=#{companyId} AND b.is_complete='1' AND b.is_reject='0' AND a.start_time::date=#{beginTime}::date ORDER BY start_time
SELECT vacation_id FROM vacation WHERE employee_id=#{employeeId} AND company_id=#{companyId} AND year_=to_char(#{attDate}::TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy')
SELECT company_id FROM organization.company_ where company_type='0'
SELECT employee_id FROM organization.employee_ WHERE company_id=#{companyId} AND employee_status='0'
